content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[MovieTest]
(
    [movie][varchar](200) NOT NULL,
    [title] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[genres] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[year] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Rating] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Rotton Tomato] [varchar](200) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (movie),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
